args.help.help: Show this help message and exit.
args.help.start.ip: The IP address to bind to (defaults to localhost).
args.help.start.port: The port to bind to (defaults to 23010).
args.help.start.dbhost: The host address for the database (defaults to localhost).
args.help.start.dbport: The port for the database (defaults to 3306).
server.chooseprocess: Which process do you want to kill? (0 to exit)
